arts.ttl: How can Cercle Brugge replace the goals of FC Cincinnati bound Kevin Denkey?
arts.sum: Kevin Denkey has played his final game in a Cercle Brugge shirt. In a fitting send off, the Togolese forward signed off with a goal in the sides 1-1 drawâ€¦
